longBusinessSummary.0: Indian Bank provides various banking products and services. The company offers deposit products, including savings bank and current accounts, term deposits, and non resident Indian (NRI) accounts. It also provides agriculture, group, personal/individual, MSME, corporate, education, and NRI loans. In addition, the company provides digital products; and applications supported by blocked amount and centralized pension processing services, as well as central schemes to provide interest subsidy. It operates through 5732 branches in India and 3 overseas branches; and 4925 ATMs and BNAs. The company was incorporated in 1907 and is based in Chennai, India.
